property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Caldara to put 1 Spirit ally from your discard pile into play for each other hero you control with a printed Spirit resource icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Squire of the Citadel leaves play, add 1 resource to a Gondor hero's resource pool.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ì hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Tome of Atanatar by 1 for each you control with the printed Leadership resource icon. Action: Discard Tome of Atanatar to play any Leadership event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is at least 1 Rohan hero in play, lower the cost to play Guthlaf by 1. If there is at least 1 Gondor hero in play, Guthlaf gains sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Encounter Action: Engage each enemy in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard the top 3 card of your deck to put Emery into play from your hand, under any player's control. Then, if any of the discarded cards have the Tactics, Lore or Leadership sphere, discard Emery.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a Silvan or Noldor ally you control. That ally gets +2 Willpower until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, shuffle that ally into its owner's deck if it is still in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Anborn to return 1 Trap card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play Poisoned Stakes into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Poisoned Stakes to the next eligble enemy that enters the staging area. At the end of each round, deal 2 damage to attached enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. You may attach 1 attachment card discarded by this effect to an eligible Dwarf character in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add the Crossroads and Black Númenorean to the staging area. Put the Faramir and Lord Alcaron objective allies into play. Shuffle the encounter deck and reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the quest phase, each player takes 1 hidden card. At the beginning of the combat phase, each player must either turn each of his hidden cards faceup or take 1 hidden card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Place Faramir and Lord Alcaron under Captured! (they are in play but players cannot gain control of them). Each player turns each of his hudden cards faceup.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the quest phase, each player takes 1 hidden card. If a player has 5 hidden cards, he must turn them faceup. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the total number of hidden cards in the game. Forced: At the end of the round, each player must raise his threat by 1 for each hiddien card in his play area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Mordor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Orc Ambusher engages you, discard 1 non-objective ally you control, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Attack enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if undefended).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk. Mordor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Brutual Uruk attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller turns all hidden cards in his play area faceup. Deal a shadow card to each enemy turned faceup by this effect and resolve their attacks as normal.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Evil Crow engages a player, that player takes 1 hidden card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Take 1 hidden card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The current quest card gains siege (and loses battle).

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of players in the game. Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ithilien. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ithilien. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: Western Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area. Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ithilien. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ithilien. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: Eastern Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area. Travel: The first player must take 2 hidden cards to travel here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Archery X.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of players in the game. Forced: After The Dark Woods leaves play as an explored location, the first player discards 1 hidden card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player turns each hidden card in his play area faceup. Resolve the "When Revealed" effects of each encounter cards turned faceup by this effect. If a location is turned faceup, add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player takes 1 hidden card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: If this attack destoys a characters, that character's controller turns each of his hidden cards faceup.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, Orc enemies engaged with players add their Threat to the staging area. If no Orc enemies are engaged with players, Conflict at the Crossroads gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Take 1 hidden card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Noble. Ranger.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The first player gains control of Faramir.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust Faramir to turn 1 hidden card faceup. If that card is an enemy, deal 3 damage to it. If Faramir leaves play, the players have lost the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Blood of Gondor

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Noble.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The first player gains control of Lord Alcaron.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Lord Alcaron to return an enemy engaged with you to the staging area. If Lord Alcaron leaves play, the players have lost the game.
